entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
